channel.title: Making key commands idk if this is right section
channel.description: im working with a map editor for my rsps and no clipping the map area takes a long time i was wondering if anyone could help me with adding a key pressed command or something to were everytime i type b or ctrl+b it will no clip the selected tile. i already know the coding for making it change just dont know how to change it to where when i type b or ctrl+b it will do what i want thanks would greatly appreciate the help
